column4: I was messing around witht he istanbul program and then I lost all my destktop icons.  Please help.
i get no such file or directory.
do mkdir ~/Desktop and then add them back
I get the following output:   mkdir: cannot create directory `/home/steven/Desktop': File exists
ok before you said that command said it didn't exist
i'm not sure why i got that output.  I'm just following your directions.  Perhaps I erred.
ohhhh I see what happened. You saved the istanbul output as Desktop, that file overwrote your Desktop directory
can i do anything about it?
so you need to move that, "mv ~/Desktop ~/someothername" then do "mkdir ~/Desktop" then start readding everything
